instruction: Send an email to my manager saying the report is done.
Email the supplier to confirm the shipment.

args.subject: Shipment Confirmation
args.body: Hello, could you please confirm the status of the shipment for order <order_id>?

instruction: Send my resignation letter to HR.

args.subject: Resignation Letter
args.body: Dear HR, I am submitting my resignation effective from <resignation_date>. Please let me know the next steps.

instruction: Notify all users about the app downtime.

args.subject: App Downtime Alert
args.body: Dear Users, our app will experience downtime from <start_time> to <end_time> due to maintenance.

instruction: Send a thank-you email to the interviewers.

args.subject: Thank You for the Interview
args.body: Thank you for taking the time to interview me for the <position_name> role.

instruction: Email the client the final version of the proposal.

args.subject: Final Proposal Document
args.body: Please find attached the final version of our proposal. Let me know your feedback.

instruction: Inform finance about the late invoice.

args.subject: Late Invoice Notification
args.body: Hi Finance, invoice <invoice_number> is past due. Please take necessary action.

instruction: Send the weekly report to the leadership team.

args.subject: Weekly Report
args.body: Please find this week's report attached. Let me know if you need any clarification.

instruction: Remind the team about tomorrow's meeting.

args.subject: Reminder: Team Meeting Tomorrow
args.body: Reminder: we have a team meeting scheduled for tomorrow at <meeting_time>.

instruction: Send my travel itinerary to the organizer.

args.subject: Travel Itinerary Submission
args.body: Attached is my travel itinerary for the upcoming event.

instruction: Let the developer know the bug is fixed.

args.subject: Bug Fix Confirmation
args.body: The issue you reported has been resolved. Let me know if anything else comes up.
